SEARCH
Package Commands

Interface CommandHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
BuildHandler, ChangeNameHandler, ChatGeneralHandler, CommandNotFoundHandler, FillHandHandler, JoinGameHandler, ListGameHandler, ListPlayersHandler, NewGameHandler, PlayCardHandler, QuitHandler, ShowHandHandler, StartHandler, TurnHandler, VoteHandler, VoteStartHandler, WhisperHandler
public interface CommandHandler
The `CommandHandler` interface outlines the contract for classes that handle commands in the server-client communication. Implementing classes must provide the logic to execute a specific command based on the server and client connection handler.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    execute(Server server, ClientConnectionHandler clientConnectionHandler)
    Executes the command handling logic based on the provided server and client connection handler.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      void execute(Server server, ClientConnectionHandler clientConnectionHandler) throws IOException
      Executes the command handling logic based on the provided server and client connection handler.
      Parameters:
      server - The server object to execute the command on.
      clientConnectionHandler - The client connection handler to process the command.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during command execution.
